meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by myxoviruses.
meanings.sent1: The myxoviral infection spread quickly through the community.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying the effects of this myxoviral disease.
meanings.sent3: The myxoviral outbreak turned the town into a ghost town.
meanings.sent4: The myxoviral illness crept through the population like a silent shadow.
meanings.sent5: The myxoviral symptoms were unmistakable, causing panic among the residents.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to a group of RNA viruses that includes influenza viruses.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are researching ways to combat myxoviral strains like influenza.
meanings.sent2: The myxoviral nature of the virus made it difficult to contain.
meanings.sent3: The myxoviral flu season always brings a wave of sickness.
meanings.sent4: The myxoviral threat loomed over the city like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The myxoviral outbreak was a reminder of the importance of vaccination.
